stripped_text: click: Host a program or piece of hardware from your grip on Personal Workshop and place power counters on it equal to its install cost. 1 credit: Remove 1 power counter from a hosted card. When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from a hosted card. When there are no power counters left on a hosted card, install it, ignoring all costs.
text:
[click]: Host a program or piece of hardware from your grip on Personal Workshop and place power counters on it equal to its install cost.
1[credit]: Remove 1 power counter from a hosted card.
When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from a hosted card.
When there are no power counters left on a hosted card, install it, ignoring all costs.
title: Personal Workshop
